summary: A preset that makes your ENB tweaking experience a bliss. All the .fx file + effect.txt file can be customized from a GUI window just like the enbseries.ini. The preset it's self is using vanilla lighting and I tried to implement as natural rendered colors as possible.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4][color=#4F81BD]This preset was created for people interested in ENB but thinks that it's a bit scary or overwhelming with all the things to change and don't really like alt+tabbing to change some aspects of the ENB.
It uses the GUI feature introduced in ENB 0.196 and uses appropriate coding to allow the .fx and .txt files commands to appear in a GUI window in-game with sliders, enable commands and so on.

Tweaking your own ENB has never been easier![/color][/size]


[color=#EEECE1][size=2]For installation and general ENB use I will re-direct you to my ENB guide which can be located here[/size][/color];
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39742//?]Guide to ENBSeries[/url]
[color=#EEECE1][size=2]And I also recommend looking into MTichneor's ENB Documentation for a even more detailed explanation of most of the ENBSeries commands and effects[/size][/color];
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23765//?]ENB Evolved[/url]


[color=#938953][size=5][b]Features;[/b][/size][/color]

[color=#EEECE1][size=2]
Using ENB version 0.201 to 0.206 (For the GUI to work you need to run with at least ENB v0.198)

A customized preset which in it's current state is not yet finished but fully playable. Updates will be done to it.
SSAO and Reflections have been tweaked and adjusted for this preset but is disabled.
You only need to activate those effects and adjust the quality settings to better cope with your own computer system & hardware.

A complete vanilla preset with tweaked SSAO and Reflections, effects disabled in it's default state.
Also included a weatherlist with all weathers assigned in it for those of you who wan't to try out the multiple weather system ENB offers, that needs to have [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36318/?]enb_reference.esp[/url] installed to function though.

All the files except for the effect.txt has been created from scratch and I implemented codes that did not cause any visual render issue and was simple yet powerful enough to have total control of the final render result.

enbeffect.fx, enbbloom.fx, enbsunsprite.fx, and effect.txt all have commands accessible via the GUI window named "shader window".

Separate Readme files explaining all the files different commands, in very simple terms so there hopefully will not be any confusion arising.

Assigned the min and max values to all the commands to their appropriate level to not cause any faulty render/pixelation or any other issue related to using a too low or high value.[/size][/color]


[size=3][color=#938953][b]Weather list content;[/b][/color][/size]
[color=#EEECE1]Weather001 - DarkSkyClearWeather.ini
Weather002 - BrightSkyClearWeather.ini
Weather003 - CloudyWeather.ini
Weather004 - RainyWeather.ini
Weather005 - FoggyWeather.ini
Weather006 - SnowyWeather.ini
Weather007 - SovngardeWeather.ini
Weather008 - BluePalaceWeather.ini
Weather009 - HelgenAttackWeather.ini
Weather010 - RiftenOvercastFog.ini
Weather011 - SkuldafnCloudyWeather.ini
Weather012 - KarthspireFogWeather.ini
Weather013 - BlackreachWeather.ini
Weather014 - BloatedMansGrottoFogWeather.ini
Weather015 - DA02Weather.ini
Weather016 - MQ206Weather.ini
Weather017 - OvercastWarWeather.ini
Weather018 - WorldMapWeather.ini[/color]


[size=5][color=#938953][b]Mods I used during the Beginner preset creation;[/b][/color][/size]

[color=#EEECE1][size=2]
[url=http://enbdev.com/enbseries/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1499&sid=47d12d99014c5a6725a6a4b9b2c83240]Mindflux Particle Patch[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28642/?]Ultimate HD Fire Effects[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24364/?]AOF HD Tree LOD[/url]
LadyBody 2.1 - Apparently there is restriction to link to certain websites, so you have to use Google and search for "LadyBody 2.1" if you want this mod.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488/?]Better Males, Genox face, Sundracon mesh[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39278/?]SC - Khajits Improvement[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36510//?]Superior Lore Friendly Hair, Rough version[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10383/?]Better Dynamic Snow[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1111/?]Pure Waters[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32505/?]Skyrim Project Optimization[/url]
[/size][/color]


[size=5][color=#938953][b]Credits;[/b][/color][/size]

[color=#EEECE1][size=2]
[b][url=http://enbdev.com/]Boris[/url][/b] - The brains and creator of the ENBseries of mods.
[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3463021/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Kyokushinoyama[/url][/b] - For code parts from his enbbloom and enbsunsprite.fx I used in my files.
[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/998429/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Kermles[/url][/b] - For his Final Adjustment code which I altered to suit my needs.
[b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2071659/?tb=mods&pUp=1]MTichenor/IndigoNeko[/url][/b] - For his Vanilla Adaptation + Bloom code which I extended with DN-IE separated commands.
[b][url=https://developer.nvidia.com/shader-library]Nvidia Shader Library[/url][/b] - For the Desaturate code which I converted to "ENB HLSL".

If there is someone I missed to put in here I apologize about that and will correct that as soon as possible.[/size][/color]
author: --JawZ--
